tasks.label: Generate ANTLR and Compile Java
args: java -Xmx500m -cp lib/antlr-4.13.1-complete.jar org.antlr.v4.Tool -Dlanguage=Java -visitor -o src/com/antlrjavacompiler/antlr src/com/antlrjavacompiler/grammar/Grammar.g4 && javac -d output -cp lib/antlr-4.13.1-complete.jar src/com/antlrjavacompiler/antlr/*.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/Main.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/exception/*.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/interpreter/*.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/classcheck/*java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/tokengenerator/*.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/ast/dot/*.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/ast/image/*.java src/com/antlrjavacompiler/ast/viewer/*.java
